name: Treasure Castle (PlaidFlannel)
description:
My entry for Kenney Jam 2022. I am still learning how to make 2D games in Unity and this jam was a fun way to try some new things!

Description:

You find yourself outside a castle and have to help a strange knight and crab... to open the doors and reveal the treasure inside. This is a very short game. 

Controls:

  • WASD movement.
  • Mouse click to advance dialogue boxes and interact with menus.
  • There are menu and reload buttons at the top of the game screen in case the game gets stuck...

Assets used :

  • Kenney Music Jungles
  • Kenney Tiny Dungeon
  • Kenney UI Pack
  • Kenney Game Icons
  • Kenney RPG Audio

(There may be something I forgot from this list, but all assets are from https://kenney.nl/assets )
